name: TB-500 (Thymosin Beta-4)
description: Synthetic fragment of thymosin beta-4, a naturally occurring peptide involved in tissue repair and regeneration. Widely used in biohacking and veterinary medicine for accelerating wound healing and reducing inflammation. Limited human clinical data but extensive animal research.

dosage.notes: Typically run in 4-6 week cycles. Subcutaneous injection. Not FDA approved for human use.

keyFindings: Promoted cardiac repair after myocardial infarction in animal models
Accelerated wound healing and hair regrowth in preclinical studies
Upregulates actin polymerization enabling cell migration to injury sites
interactions: May interact with anticoagulants due to wound-healing effects
